info.title: Oxmeta + RREAD Protocol with Dramatiq
info.description:
Professional-grade crypto market intelligence API with pay-per-request pricing.
    
    ## Features
    - 🔒 Pay-per-request: $0.01 USDC per call
    - 📊 Real-time market trends and narratives
    - 💧 DeFi liquidity signals and TVL tracking
    - 🤖 AI agent ecosystem monitoring
    - 📈 Macro economic event tracking
    - ⭐ Curated proof-of-work intelligence feed
    
    ## Authentication
    All paid endpoints require x402 payment proof via `X-Payment-Proof` header.
    
    ## Data Sources
    - CryptoNews API (verified journalism)
    - Curated X (Twitter) accounts
    - Onchain data providers
    
    ## Performance
    - Cached responses: <100ms
    - Fresh data: 2-3 seconds
    - Cache TTL: 1 hour (Redis), 24 hours (Database)

get.description:
🔒 **Market Trends** - $0.01 per request

Get trending market narratives and emerging themes across crypto markets.

🔒 **Liquidity Signals** - $0.01 per request

Track DeFi liquidity flows, TVL changes, and capital movement.

🔒 **AI Agent Intelligence** - $0.01 per request

Monitor autonomous AI agent ecosystem developments and trading activity.

🔒 **Macro Events** - $0.01 per request

Track macro economic events affecting crypto markets.

🔒 **Proof of Work Feed** - $0.01 per request

Curated, high-signal market intelligence feed. Executive briefing quality.

📖 **Available Categories** - FREE

Get list of all available market intelligence categories.

🔓 **FREE** - Generate a payment request for an endpoint.

This tells you what payment is needed to access a specific endpoint.

**Example:**
```
GET /v1/payment/request?endpoint=/v1/markets/trends
```

post.description:
🔓 **FREE** - Generate a mock payment proof for TESTNET ONLY.

⚠️ This is for testing purposes only. In production, payment proofs come from actual on-chain transactions.

**Example:**
```
POST /v1/payment/mock-proof
    ?tx_hash=0x123...
    &from_address=0xYourWallet
    &endpoint=/v1/markets/trends
```

Returns a base64-encoded proof you can use in X-Payment-Proof header.

get.description:
🔓 **FREE** - Verify a payment proof without making an API call.

Useful for debugging. Decodes and validates the proof structure.

**Example:**
```
GET /v1/payment/verify-proof?proof=eyJ0eF9oYXNoIjoi...
```

📖 **FREE** - Complete example flow for testing with Postman/curl.

Shows step-by-step how to test the paid endpoints.

🚀 **FREE** - One-step test for developers.

This combines steps 2-4 into one call for quick testing.
TESTNET ONLY - does not work on mainnet.

**Example:**
```
GET /v1/payment/quick-test?endpoint=/v1/markets/trends
```

Returns the API response as if you had paid.

priority.description: How deep the research should go: low, normal, high

force_human_approval.title: Force Human Approval
force_human_approval.description: 🔥 Force human approval regardless of quality scores

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: How much to trust this vs discovered data

x402Payment.name: X-Payment-Proof
x402Payment.description:
Payment proof from x402 protocol 
        
        To get a payment proof:
        1. Connect your Web3 wallet
        2. Approve $0.01 USDC payment
        3. Receive payment proof JWT
        4. Include in this header
        
        Example: `eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...`

tags.name: 📊 Market Intelligence
tags.description:
Real-time crypto market intelligence endpoints.
            
            **Cost**: $0.01 USDC per request
            
            All endpoints return curated data from multiple sources including
            crypto-news, verified X accounts, and onchain analytics.
